titleStmt.title: The Malice of the independent-agent again rebuked and his falshood detected chiefly about the man Jesus Christ, in reply to his answer to a sheet entituled The independent-agent.
titleStmt.author: Stout, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 22: Henry Stout, Henry Sweeting, Richard Thomas, Richard Martin, Edward Plumsted.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
